command.text: declare @c varchar(4), @d varchar(4), @startYear int select @c = rtrim(year(ngay_ks)), @startYear = nam_bd from dmstt select @d = rtrim(year(ngay_ks)) from dmdvcsks where ma_dvcs = @@unit and ngay_ks is not null select @d = isnull(@d, '') select 'this._lockedDate = ''' + @c + ''';this._lockedUnit = ''' + @d + ''';this._startYear = ' + rtrim(@startYear) + ';active$AccountBalanceAdjustment$(this);' as message return

script.text: function active$AccountBalanceAdjustment$(a){a.add_onResponseComplete(on$AccountBalanceAdjustment$ResponseComplete);a.setItemValue("nam",(new Date).getFullYear())}function close$AccountBalanceAdjustment$(a){try{a.remove_onResponseComplete(on$AccountBalanceAdjustment$ResponseComplete)}catch(b){}}function on$AccountBalanceAdjustment$ResponseComplete(i,e){var c=e.object,g=e.type.Context,h=e.type.Result;switch(g){case"Checking":var a=c.grid,f=[];a._year=c.getItemValue("nam");var d=a._year.toString(),b=c._lockedDate>=d;a._denyNew=a._deny$Unit;a._denyMessage=null;if(!a._denyNew)a._denyNew=b;a._denyEdit=a._denyDelete=a._denyImport=b;if(!b&&!a._denyNew)b=a._denyNew=c._lockedUnit>=d;if(b)a._denyMessage=c._language=="v"?"Đã khóa số liệu, kiểm tra lại ngày khóa sổ.":"Data is locked, you must modify system locked date.";if(!b)b=a._denyNew=a._denyEdit=a._denyDelete=a._denyImport=c._startYear>=d;if(b)a._denyMessage=c._language=="v"?"Năm điều chỉnh có giá trị nhập không hợp lệ.":"Adjusted year is invalid.";Array.add(f,{Name:"nam",Opr:"=",Value:a._year,Type:"Numeric",Ignore:false});a._alterTitle=[null,[["%s1",d,true]]];a.set_externalKey(f)}}
